title: How to Make Peach Apple Crisp

steps.headline: Combine the peaches, apples, vanilla, and cinnamon in a bowl.
steps.description: Toss well and spread evenly in a greased casserole dish.

steps.headline: Combine the flour and sugar in small bowl.
Cut in the margarine with two knives until the mixture resembles coarse meal.
Sprinkle the flour mixture evenly over the fruit.
Bake until lightly browned and bubbly, about 20 minutes.
Serve.
steps.description: This goes well with cream, ice cream, or custard.

text: Preheat the oven to 350ºF. Lightly grease the casserole dish. Combine the peaches, apples, vanilla, and cinnamon in a bowl. Toss well and spread evenly in a greased casserole dish. Combine the flour and sugar in small bowl.  Cut in the margarine with two knives until the mixture resembles coarse meal.  Sprinkle the flour mixture evenly over the fruit.  Bake until lightly browned and bubbly, about 20 minutes.  Serve. This goes well with cream, ice cream, or custard. Finished.
